Jeffrey Daniel Sciullo is an American professional wrestler and musician. He is currently signed to WWE, where he performs on the Raw brand under the ring name Ezekiel. He is better known by the ring name Elias. As Elias, he portrayed a musician who often used music to mock his opponents or the fans in attendance.

Jeffrey Daniel Sciullo is an American professional wrestler and musician. He is currently signed to WWE, where he performs on the Raw brand under the ring name Ezekiel. He is better known by the ring name Elias. As Elias, he portrayed a musician who often used music to mock his opponents or the fans in attendance.

Literally just a few years ago, Orton had gotten stale as hell. He was boring, clearly unmotivated and didn't seem to care at all. I dunno what changed in the last 2 years to motivate him and get his drive back but he has consistently been one of the best things on TV for a while now.

Plus, his partnership with Riddle has really seemed to get him going. He genuinely seems to be having more fun now than he has in the last 10-15 years of his career. It's really nice to see him going strong 20 years in.
